# Logaritmefunktioner

::: {.callout-note}
## 10-talslogartimen
$$
\begin{gather}
& \log(10^x) = x
& \text{og}
& 10^{\log(x)} = x 
\end{gather}
$$
:::

::: {.callout-tip}
### Eksempel
$$
\log(1000) = \log(10^3) = 3
$$
:::

::: {.callout-note}
## Den naturlige logaritme
$$
\begin{gather}
& \ln(e^x)=x
& \text{og}
& e^{\ln(x)} = x
\end{gather}
$$

:::

::: {.callout-tip}
### Eksempel
$$
e^{\ln(9)}=9
$$
:::


## 
Bestem uden brug af CAS
$$
\begin{gather}
&
\begin{aligned}
&\text{a.} \ \log(10^{5}) \\
&\text{b.} \ \log(10^{-3}) \\
&\text{c.} \ 10^{\log(2)} \\
&\text{d.} \ 10^{\log(100)} \\
&\text{e.} \ \ln(e^{5}) \\
&\text{f.} \ \ln(e^{-10}) \\
\end{aligned}
&
\begin{aligned}
&\text{g.} \ \ln(e) \\
&\text{h.} \ \ln(1) \\
&\text{i.} \ \log(100) \\
&\text{j.} \ \log(10000) \\
&\text{k.} \ \log(0.01) \\
&\text{l.} \ \log(0.000001) \\
\end{aligned}
\end{gather}
$$
